data.description:
Nominated for 'AppLab Game of the year 2024' by the Ruff Talk podcast.

Let's get twisting!!!

TWISTEX is a falling block puzzle game with a 'twist'. Made especially for VR, it combines classic gameplay with original new mechanics.

CLEAR RINGS, COLORS AND LEVELS
TWISTEX has 2 game types, Ring Clear and Color Clear. Each has an endless mode with 3 difficulties, and 24 levels to complete.

MIXED REALITY FILTERS
Turn your surroundings into colorful environments, with dynamic lighting. Or select the 3D version to be fully immersed.

UNLOCK AND CUSTOMIZE
Clearing levels will unlock new towers, blocks, music and environments, for you to customize your experience.

FEEL THE PRESSURE
As the blocks get higher, so does the pressure. Try to keep your cool as the music and environment react to how you're doing.

changelog.change_log: Small bug fix for users with older save files.

'The HUGE Update' features many changes based on user feedback, focused on making it easier for new users and improving the overall experience.

Changes include-

-All Environments from the PC version are now available in the Quest version. Choose between them and the original 'Mixed Reality Filters'.
-A shape guide to show where the shape will land, and how far it has to drop, making it much easier to place shapes where you want them.
-A 'Practice Mode' where you can plan your strategy without any pressure.
-Blocks at the back of the tower become darker and tweaks to custom designs, to improve their visibility in game.
-Decreased starting speeds and easy levels are easier.
-An overhaul of the menu, making it easier to navigate.
-Clearer messaging of modes and features.
-Clearer information and demo of the game you are selecting.
-Tips on the title screen to help new players.
-Many other small tweaks, bug fixes and a heavy layer of polish.
